DOC.brief_title: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy - Bone Marrow Transplant
DOC.detailed_description: Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy - Bone Marrow Transplant (FACT-BMT)
DOC.criteria: Patients with newly diagnosed Hodgkin's Disease and NonHodgkin's Lymphoma Patients with diagnosis other than HD and NHL.
